trans-unit.source: Set Up Document Layout

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Document Layout

trans-unit.source: After the new report is created through the Object Designer, a new Document Text is created for Item Report, and a new Document Layout is created with No. = ITEM-01 and Description = Item Report. The document layout is set up to be printed from the Item record, links to the new Item Printout report and the DC - A4 Portrait render report.

seg-source.mrk: After the new report is created through the Object Designer, a new Document Text is created for Item Report, and a new Document Layout is created with No.
= ITEM-01 and Description = Item Report.
The document layout is set up to be printed from the Item record, links to the new Item Printout report and the DC - A4 Portrait render report.

trans-unit.source: Create Document Text

seg-source.mrk: Create Document Text

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the document text for the new report:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the document text for the new report:

trans-unit.source: In the RoleTailored Client, click Document Texts in the Configuration menu.

seg-source.mrk: In the RoleTailored Client, click Document Texts in the Configuration menu.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New.

trans-unit.source:
Enter the following:
  1. Code = ItemReport
  2. Text = Item Report
  3. Language Code = {local language}
  4. Text = {text for Item Report in local language}

seg-source.mrk: Enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Code = ItemReport
• Text = Item Report
• Language Code = {local language}
• Text = {text for Item Report in local language}

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Document Text page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Document Text page.

trans-unit.source: Create Document Layout

seg-source.mrk: Create Document Layout

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create the document layout for the new report:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to create the document layout for the new report:

trans-unit.source: In the Configuration menu, click Document Layouts.

seg-source.mrk: In the Configuration menu, click Document Layouts.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field, type ITEM-01.

seg-source.mrk: In the No.
field, type ITEM-01.

trans-unit.source:
Enter the following:
  1. Description = Item Report
  2. Top DataItem Table No. = 27
  3. Report No. = as noted in step 18 of the previous section
  4. Render Report No. = 12032027
  5. Document Label Code = ITEMREPORT

seg-source.mrk: Enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Description = Item Report
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList"><span class="Bold">Top DataItem Table No.
= 27
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList"><span class="Bold">Report No.
= as noted in step 18 of the previous section
<li class="ccTextvorlageNumberedList"><span class="Bold">Render Report No.
• Document Label Code = ITEMREPORT

trans-unit.source: : New Document Layout for new Item Printout report

seg-source.mrk: : New Document Layout for new Item Printout report

trans-unit.source: Add Sections

seg-source.mrk: Add Sections

trans-unit.source: The Sections of the document layout are set up with the following: Item table as the header (sections almost always start with the same table from which the report is run), Production BOM Header table, Production BOM Lines table, Routing Header table, Routing Line table and the Integer table to print a footer. Certain Sections are indented to create the table relation hierarchy.

seg-source.mrk: The Sections of the document layout are set up with the following: Item table as the header (sections almost always start with the same table from which the report is run), Production BOM Header table, Production BOM Lines table, Routing Header table, Routing Line table and the Integer table to print a footer.
Certain Sections are indented to create the table relation hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to add Sections to the document layout:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to add Sections to the document layout:

trans-unit.source:
On the first line of the Sections FastTab, enter the following:
  1.  Section Type = Header
  2.  Description = Header
  3.  Table No. = 27

seg-source.mrk: On the first line of the Sections FastTab, enter the following:
•  Section Type = Header
•  Description = Header
•  Table No.

trans-unit.source:
On the next line, enter the following:
  1. Section Type = Line
  2. Description = Header for BOM
  3. Table No. = 99000771

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Section Type = Line
• Description = Header for BOM
• Table No.

trans-unit.source:
On the next line, enter the following:
  1. Section Type = Line
  2. Description = BOM Lines
  3. Table No. = 99000772

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Section Type = Line
• Description = BOM Lines
• Table No.

trans-unit.source:
On the next line, enter the following:
  1. Section Type = Line
  2. Description = Header for Routing
  3. Table No. = 99000763

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Section Type = Line
• Description = Header for Routing
• Table No.

trans-unit.source:
On the next line, enter the following:
  1. Section Type = Line
  2. Description = Routing Lines
  3. Table No. = 99000764

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Section Type = Line
• Description = Routing Lines
• Table No.

trans-unit.source:
On the next line, enter the following:
  1. Section Type = Footer
  2. Description = Footer
  3. Table No. = 2000000026

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, enter the following: <ol start="1">
• Section Type = Footer
• Description = Footer
• Table No.

trans-unit.source: Select the second line and click Line > Move Right.

seg-source.mrk: Select the second line and click Line > Move Right.

trans-unit.source: Select the third line and click Line > Move Right.

seg-source.mrk: Select the third line and click Line > Move Right.

trans-unit.source: Repeat for the third line so it is indented below the second line.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat for the third line so it is indented below the second line.

trans-unit.source: Select the fourth line and click Line > Move Right.

seg-source.mrk: Select the fourth line and click Line > Move Right.

trans-unit.source: Select the fifth line and click Line > Move Right.

seg-source.mrk: Select the fifth line and click Line > Move Right.

trans-unit.source: Repeat for the fifth line so it is indented below the fourth line.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat for the fifth line so it is indented below the fourth line.

trans-unit.source: : Sections added to the Document Layout for the new Item Printout report

seg-source.mrk: : Sections added to the Document Layout for the new Item Printout report

trans-unit.source: Set Filters on Sections

seg-source.mrk: Set Filters on Sections

trans-unit.source: Filters need to be set for the Sections to define the relations between the tables. The first line connects the Item header to the Top DataItem Table (specified in the header of the Document Layout).

seg-source.mrk: Filters need to be set for the Sections to define the relations between the tables.
The first line connects the Item header to the Top DataItem Table (specified in the header of the Document Layout).

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to add filters to the sections:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to add filters to the sections:

trans-unit.source: Select the first section line “Header” and then click Line > Filters.

seg-source.mrk: Select the first section line “Header” and then click Line > Filters.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 1
  2. Filter Type = Value
  3. Filter Field No. = 1

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Field No.
• Filter Type = Value
• Filter Field No.

trans-unit.source: : Filter added to the Header section of the new ITEM-01 document layout

seg-source.mrk: : Filter added to the Header section of the new ITEM-01 document layout

trans-unit.source: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

trans-unit.source: Select the second section line “Header for BOM” and then click Line > Filters.

seg-source.mrk: Select the second section line “Header for BOM” and then click Line > Filters.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 1
  2. Filter Type = Value
  3. Filter Field No. = 99000751

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Field No.
• Filter Type = Value
• Filter Field No.

trans-unit.source: : Filter added to the Header for BOM section of the new ITEM-01 document layout

seg-source.mrk: : Filter added to the Header for BOM section of the new ITEM-01 document layout

trans-unit.source: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

trans-unit.source: Select the third section line “BOM Lines” and then click Line > Filters.

seg-source.mrk: Select the third section line “BOM Lines” and then click Line > Filters.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 1
  2. Filter Type = Value
  3. Filter Field No. = 1

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Field No.
• Filter Type = Value
• Filter Field No.

trans-unit.source:
On the next line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 3
  2. Filter Type = Text
  3. Text = ‘’

seg-source.mrk: On the next line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Field No.
• Filter Type = Text
• Text = ‘’

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: A blank (‘’) filter is specified on the Version Code to omit BOM versions from printing.

seg-source.mrk: A blank (‘’) filter is specified on the Version Code to omit BOM versions from printing.

trans-unit.source: : Filters added to the BOM Lines section of the new ITEM-01 document layout

seg-source.mrk: : Filters added to the BOM Lines section of the new ITEM-01 document layout

trans-unit.source: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

trans-unit.source: Select the fourth section line “Header for Routing” and then click Line > Filters.

seg-source.mrk: Select the fourth section line “Header for Routing” and then click Line > Filters.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 1
  2. Filter Type = Value
  3. Filter Field No. = 99000750

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Field No.
• Filter Type = Value
• Filter Field No.

trans-unit.source: : Filter added to the Header for Routing section of the new ITEM-01 document layout

seg-source.mrk: : Filter added to the Header for Routing section of the new ITEM-01 document layout

trans-unit.source: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

trans-unit.source: Select the fifth section line “Routing Lines” and then click Line > Filters.

seg-source.mrk: Select the fifth section line “Routing Lines” and then click Line > Filters.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 1
  2. Filter Type = Value
  3. Filter Field No. = 1

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, enter the following:<ol start="1">
• Field No.
• Filter Type = Value
• Filter Field No.

trans-unit.source:
On the next line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 2
  2. Filter Type = Text
  3. Text = ‘’

trans-unit.source: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

trans-unit.source: Select the last section line “Footer” and then click Line > Filters.

seg-source.mrk: Select the last section line “Footer” and then click Line > Filters.

trans-unit.source:
On the first line, enter the following:
  1. Field No. = 1
  2. Filter Type = Text
  3. Text = 1

seg-source.mrk: On the first line, enter the following:<ol start="1">

• Filter Type = Text

trans-unit.source: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Document Layout Filters page.

trans-unit.source: Defining the Sections and the related filters are similar to setting up the DataItems in a native report.

seg-source.mrk: Defining the Sections and the related filters are similar to setting up the DataItems in a native report.

trans-unit.source: Assign Fields to the Sections

seg-source.mrk: Assign Fields to the Sections

trans-unit.source: The next step is to add the different fields that need to print in the different Sections. Two columns are added to the Header fields: one with the labels and one with the values. Captions are used for the labels because this report will only be printed in the local language.

seg-source.mrk: The next step is to add the different fields that need to print in the different Sections.
Two columns are added to the Header fields: one with the labels and one with the values.
Captions are used for the labels because this report will only be printed in the local language.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to assign fields to the sections:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to assign fields to the sections:

trans-unit.source: Select the first section line “Header” and then click Line > Fields.

seg-source.mrk: Select the first section line “Header” and then click Line > Fields.

trans-unit.source: For the purpose of this example, use the data in the following screen shot to create the field entries for the item report header section.

seg-source.mrk: For the purpose of this example, use the data in the following screen shot to create the field entries for the item report header section.

trans-unit.source: : Fields added to the Header section of the new ITEM-01 document layout

seg-source.mrk: : Fields added to the Header section of the new ITEM-01 document layout

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Run Report to view the settings.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Run Report to view the settings.

trans-unit.source: Select the Show Request Page check box and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Show Request Page check box and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: In the request page, click Preview.

seg-source.mrk: In the request page, click Preview.

trans-unit.source: : Header section on the new Item Printout report

seg-source.mrk: : Header section on the new Item Printout report

trans-unit.source: Close the Print Preview page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Print Preview page.

trans-unit.source: Close the Document Layout Fields page.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Document Layout Fields page.

trans-unit.source: The fields added to the “Header for BOM” section includes information from the Production BOM Header table but also labels that are acting as headings for the lines. Note that when printing Captions of fields, a field can be selected from any table in the database without having to set filters.

seg-source.mrk: The fields added to the “Header for BOM” section includes information from the Production BOM Header table but also labels that are acting as headings for the lines.
Note that when printing Captions of fields, a field can be selected from any table in the database without having to set filters.

trans-unit.source: Select the second section line “Header for BOM” and then click Line > Fields.
